title: Language Teacher Education Design Utilizing Generative AI: Systematic Analysis and Practical Application

context.prior_knowledge: Familiarity with fundamental AI tools and language teaching experience in secondary/high school settings
context.additional_context: Program for pre-service and in-service math teachers to develop instructional design competencies for integrating generative AI into language education

learning_goals: Learners can classify and explain the applicability of generative AI in language education into three or more case types (chatbots, assessment tools, etc.)
Learners can identify five ethical considerations and propose mitigation strategies when applying generative AI to language lesson design
Learners can systematically design math-integrated language activities (e.g., problem-solving explanations) using AI-based tools through a step-by-step process

resources: Access to Generative AI Tools (e.g., ChatGPT)
Academic Database on AI Education Research

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
